Description: This is a very fine HEUER chronograph 1/10 pocket watch, split / rattrapante, open face, circa 1970, metal case, diam. approx. 65 mm. (excluded the pendant), nice case design; manual wind fine movement HEUER LEONIDAS, with micro-metric regulator; original dial in black and white, with escale of seconds in red; with the original box. The watch is in great condition; and has been timed, keeping time properly. We restored this watch following our best criteria, but this watch is used, and could be possible to find any little detail, then remember than details do not named in the listing, but visible in the pictures, will be consider as named. This item is rare and hard to find. Highly Collectible Item!!!
